title: Hilltop Land with Spectacular Ocean View - LIP 111
details: LIP-111 The property is situated upon a hilltop with 360-degree views over Indian Ocean. This undeveloped land with its own private access is ideally positioned for the development of a boutique hotel or private beach house, and is within an area that has become a very popular destination for the tourists. The property is situated between two beautiful beaches; on one side, 2 min walk from property is one of the most beautiful beaches in Sri Lanka and 2 min walk to the other side is a perfect spot for wave surfing and snorkeling. Tangalle town with all town facilities and amenities is less than 4 km away.
